Title: Real-time parking information system with cloud computing open architecture approach
Source title: International Journal of Emerging Trends in Engineering Research
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Malubaya, B.W.K., Information Systems Management Department, Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Wang, G., Information Systems Management Department, Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: Technology nowadays is evolving quite fast and human themself try to transform everything into digital to make things easier and reachable without space and time limitation. For instance a cloud server that make possible for a person or a company to have a server without have any real physical server. It can reduce cost and easy to maintain. In current parking system there are local server that serving a ticketing and billing, few of them are displaying the park lot status in a front gate for to notify the users. In this paper we provides a concept to make the information of park lot go directly onto users hand with smartphones assistance so decision time will be reduce. © 2020, World Academy of Research in Science and Engineering. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Cloud computing; Parking system; Service oriented architecture; Smart monitoring
